hooks.command: NAMESPACE="$([[ -n "$TMUX" ]] && echo "/tmp/claude/$(basename "${TMUX%%,*}")" || echo "/tmp/claude/default")" && echo "[$(date +%s.%N)] STOP_START pane=$TMUX_PANE namespace=$NAMESPACE test=$CLAUDE_E2E_TEST" >> "$NAMESPACE/hook-debug.log" && [[ -n "$TMUX_PANE" ]] && [[ "$TMUX_PANE" =~ ^%[0-9]+$ ]] && mkdir -p "$NAMESPACE" && echo 'stop' > "$NAMESPACE/tui-alert-$TMUX_PANE" && echo "[$(date +%s.%N)] STOP_SUCCESS pane=$TMUX_PANE file_created=yes" >> "$NAMESPACE/hook-debug.log" || echo "[$(date +%s.%N)] STOP_FAILED pane=$TMUX_PANE code=$?" >> "$NAMESPACE/hook-debug.log"

NAMESPACE="$([[ -n "$TMUX" ]] && echo "/tmp/claude/$(basename "${TMUX%%,*}")" || echo "/tmp/claude/default")" && echo "[$(date +%s.%N)] SUBMIT_START pane=$TMUX_PANE namespace=$NAMESPACE" >> "$NAMESPACE/hook-debug.log" && [[ -n "$TMUX_PANE" ]] && [[ "$TMUX_PANE" =~ ^%[0-9]+$ ]] && mkdir -p "$NAMESPACE" && echo 'working' > "$NAMESPACE/tui-alert-$TMUX_PANE" && echo "[$(date +%s.%N)] SUBMIT_SUCCESS pane=$TMUX_PANE state=working" >> "$NAMESPACE/hook-debug.log" || echo "[$(date +%s.%N)] SUBMIT_FAILED pane=$TMUX_PANE code=$?" >> "$NAMESPACE/hook-debug.log"

NAMESPACE="$([[ -n "$TMUX" ]] && echo "/tmp/claude/$(basename "${TMUX%%,*}")" || echo "/tmp/claude/default")" && echo "[$(date +%s.%N)] POSTTOOL_START pane=$TMUX_PANE namespace=$NAMESPACE" >> "$NAMESPACE/hook-debug.log" && [[ -n "$TMUX_PANE" ]] && [[ "$TMUX_PANE" =~ ^%[0-9]+$ ]] && [[ -f "$NAMESPACE/tui-alert-$TMUX_PANE" ]] && grep -q "permission" "$NAMESPACE/tui-alert-$TMUX_PANE" && echo 'working' > "$NAMESPACE/tui-alert-$TMUX_PANE" && echo "[$(date +%s.%N)] POSTTOOL_SUCCESS pane=$TMUX_PANE permission_cleared=yes" >> "$NAMESPACE/hook-debug.log" || echo "[$(date +%s.%N)] POSTTOOL_SKIPPED pane=$TMUX_PANE" >> "$NAMESPACE/hook-debug.log"

NAMESPACE="$([[ -n "$TMUX" ]] && echo "/tmp/claude/$(basename "${TMUX%%,*}")" || echo "/tmp/claude/default")" && echo "[$(date +%s.%N)] PERMISSION_START pane=$TMUX_PANE namespace=$NAMESPACE" >> "$NAMESPACE/hook-debug.log" && [[ -n "$TMUX_PANE" ]] && [[ "$TMUX_PANE" =~ ^%[0-9]+$ ]] && mkdir -p "$NAMESPACE" && echo 'permission' > "$NAMESPACE/tui-alert-$TMUX_PANE" && echo "[$(date +%s.%N)] PERMISSION_SUCCESS pane=$TMUX_PANE" >> "$NAMESPACE/hook-debug.log" || echo "[$(date +%s.%N)] PERMISSION_FAILED pane=$TMUX_PANE code=$?" >> "$NAMESPACE/hook-debug.log"

NAMESPACE="$([[ -n "$TMUX" ]] && echo "/tmp/claude/$(basename "${TMUX%%,*}")" || echo "/tmp/claude/default")" && echo "[$(date +%s.%N)] IDLE_START pane=$TMUX_PANE namespace=$NAMESPACE" >> "$NAMESPACE/hook-debug.log" && [[ -n "$TMUX_PANE" ]] && [[ "$TMUX_PANE" =~ ^%[0-9]+$ ]] && mkdir -p "$NAMESPACE" && echo 'idle' > "$NAMESPACE/tui-alert-$TMUX_PANE" && echo "[$(date +%s.%N)] IDLE_SUCCESS pane=$TMUX_PANE" >> "$NAMESPACE/hook-debug.log" || echo "[$(date +%s.%N)] IDLE_FAILED pane=$TMUX_PANE code=$?" >> "$NAMESPACE/hook-debug.log"

NAMESPACE="$([[ -n "$TMUX" ]] && echo "/tmp/claude/$(basename "${TMUX%%,*}")" || echo "/tmp/claude/default")" && echo "[$(date +%s.%N)] ELICITATION_START pane=$TMUX_PANE namespace=$NAMESPACE" >> "$NAMESPACE/hook-debug.log" && [[ -n "$TMUX_PANE" ]] && [[ "$TMUX_PANE" =~ ^%[0-9]+$ ]] && mkdir -p "$NAMESPACE" && echo 'elicitation' > "$NAMESPACE/tui-alert-$TMUX_PANE" && echo "[$(date +%s.%N)] ELICITATION_SUCCESS pane=$TMUX_PANE" >> "$NAMESPACE/hook-debug.log" || echo "[$(date +%s.%N)] ELICITATION_FAILED pane=$TMUX_PANE code=$?" >> "$NAMESPACE/hook-debug.log"
